p: Using a multi-channel pipette, lipase solution (25 µL/well of 50 mU/mL, final concentration 12.5 mU/mL) was added to all test wells and mixed by gentle pipetting. Assay buffer I (25 µL/well) was added to all test wells to bring the volume up to 100 µL. The plate was incubated in darkness at RT for 5 min.
